mapper.select: SELECT housedeals.*, houseinfos.*, CONCAT(houseinfos.road_nm, ' ', houseinfos.road_nm_bonbun, CASE WHEN houseinfos.road_nm_bubun != '0' THEN CONCAT('-', houseinfos.road_nm_bubun) ELSE '' END) AS road_address, CONCAT(houseinfos.umd_nm, ' ', houseinfos.jibun) AS old_address FROM housedeals JOIN houseinfos ON houseinfos.apt_seq = housedeals.apt_seq WHERE apt_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')

SELECT housedeals.*, houseinfos.*, CONCAT(houseinfos.road_nm, ' ', houseinfos.road_nm_bonbun, CASE WHEN houseinfos.road_nm_bubun != '0' THEN CONCAT('-', houseinfos.road_nm_bubun) ELSE '' END) AS road_address, CONCAT(houseinfos.umd_nm, ' ', houseinfos.jibun) AS old_address FROM housedeals JOIN houseinfos ON housedeals.apt_seq = houseinfos.apt_seq WHERE houseinfos.road_nm = #{roadNm} AND houseinfos.road_nm_bonbun = #{roadNmBonbun} AND houseinfos.road_nm_bubun = #{roadNmBubun} ORDER BY housedeals.deal_year DESC, housedeals.deal_month DESC, housedeals.deal_day DESC
